aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Software developer specialized in enterprise solutions with .NET, SQL Server, and process automation. My experience ranges from developing MVC applications to implementing data analysis systems. I have participated in data science competitions such as the WiDS 2022 datathon (breast cancer detection) and WiDS 2025 (ADHD detection in women), applying machine learning techniques to solve real-world health sector problems. I combine my experience in software engineering with data analysis to deliver complete solutions, from system architecture to actionable insights visualization.

skills.title: Skills and Technologies
skills.applicationsList: PowerBI, Excel, Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code
skills.closing: My professional approach is characterized by technological adaptability and continuous learning, allowing me to integrate new tools and methodologies to optimize processes and generate value in every project.

goals.title: Professional Focus
goals.description: Specialized in developing solutions that integrate software engineering with data analysis to maximize business impact.
goals.journeyDescription: My professional experience in technology began with my education in Information Technology Engineering at UTAN campus industrias. What drives my work is the creative process of designing scalable and customized solutions for each technical challenge. Developing enterprise applications, I have refined my ability to create solutions that optimize processes and improve the end-user experience. This experience has allowed me to expand my competencies toward data analysis, where I combine software development with statistical modeling to create intelligent end-to-end systems. I maintain active tracking of technological trends and develop projects that explore new technologies. My work methodology is based on technical pragmatism, continuous optimization, and delivery of measurable results.

daikin.name: Daikin Manufacturing México
daikin.description: Development and support of enterprise applications using MVC architecture with .NET and SQL Server. Responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of APIs and databases for critical production systems.
daikin.feature1: Maintenance and evolution of business-critical applications
daikin.feature2: Design and implementation of new functionalities according to technical specifications
daikin.feature3: SQL query optimization and stored procedure development
daikin.techList: ASP.NET MVC, C#, JavaScript, HTML, Bootstrap, Oracle SQL, SQL Server, Oracle, SAP, JQuery and JSON files
daikin.challenge1: Integration of complex requirements in high-availability enterprise environments
daikin.challenge3: Implementation of continuous improvements in legacy systems

overtime.title: Desktop Application 'OverTime Request'
overtime.description: Development and support of the automated overtime cost calculation module, including estimation of food and transportation expenses for production staff. Implementation of complex business logic and data validations.

etiquetas.title: Desktop Application 'Etiquetas'
etiquetas.description: Development of application for the warehouse area that queries supplier information in Oracle, generates dynamic labels and manages automated printing. Configurable system through JSON files for maximum operational flexibility.

masterLabel.title: Web Application 'Master Label'
masterLabel.description: Design and implementation of web system for recording and analyzing errors in Master Labels, facilitating pattern identification and root cause analysis through reports and dashboards.

budgetControl.title: Web Application 'Budget Control'
budgetControl.description: Development of application for the finance area that automates repetitive processes, integrates multiple Excel data sources, and efficiently calculates budgets and costs. Significant reduction in manual processing times.

devportfolio.name: DevPortfolio
devportfolio.shortDescription: Professional developer portfolio with space design and glassmorphism
devportfolio.description: Professional web portfolio with unique design that integrates space elements and glassmorphism effects, presenting technical skills, projects and professional trajectory in a visual and interactive way.
devportfolio.feature1: Space design with star and shooting star animations
devportfolio.feature3: Partial views system for dynamic navigation
devportfolio.feature5: Social media integration with animated effects
devportfolio.techList: ASP.NET MVC, C#, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
devportfolio.challenge2: Development of custom carousel with advanced controls
devportfolio.challenge3: Integration of glassmorphism effects maintaining cross-browser compatibility
devportfolio.challenge4: Robust system for transition management and navigation state

datathon2022.name: WiDS Datathon 2022
datathon2022.title: WiDS Datathon 2022 – Early Detection of Breast Cancer
datathon2022.description: Development of predictive model for early breast cancer detection using machine learning techniques applied to clinical data, focused on accurate risk classification.
datathon2022.feature1: Cleaning and preprocessing of complex medical datasets
datathon2022.feature2: Implementation of classification models (decision trees and regression)
datathon2022.feature3: Evaluation with specialized metrics for imbalanced data (AUC, F1, recall)
datathon2022.techList: Jupyter, Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, NumPy, Matplotlib
datathon2022.challenge1: Treatment of class imbalance in positive diagnoses
datathon2022.challenge3: Feature selection with clinical and statistical relevance

datathon2025.name: WiDS Datathon 2025
datathon2025.title: WiDS Datathon 2025 – Detection of ADHD and ADD in Adolescent Women
datathon2025.description: Development of predictive model for early identification of patterns associated with ADHD and ADD in adolescent female population, addressing the challenge of atypical symptoms and underrepresentation in training data.
datathon2025.feature1: Cleaning and structuring of complex neurocognitive datasets
datathon2025.feature2: Processing of neurocognitive and behavioral variables
datathon2025.feature4: Signal analysis and extraction of relevant psychological variables
datathon2025.feature5: Implementation of regularization techniques to improve generalization
datathon2025.feature6: Stratified cross-validation by age ranges and gender
datathon2025.techList: Jupyter, Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, NumPy, XGBoost
datathon2025.challenge1: Handling noise in data due to high individual neuropsychological variability
datathon2025.challenge2: Separation of symptoms with high correlation between ADD and ADHD
datathon2025.challenge3: Balancing classes and diverse clinical profiles
datathon2025.challenge4: Validation of gender bias in predictions

bookshelf.feature1: Comprehensive management of books, authors and genres
bookshelf.techList: ASP.NET MVC, C#, SQL Server, Dapper, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
bookshelf.challenge1: Design of complex relationship system between entities
bookshelf.challenge2: Implementation of responsive UI with Bootstrap

prosalud.name: ProSalud
prosalud.title: ProSalud - Medical Management System
prosalud.description: Comprehensive platform for managing medical offices that automates administrative and clinical processes, from appointment scheduling to medical records management and billing.
prosalud.feature1: Complete management of clinical records and patient files
prosalud.feature2: Appointment scheduling system and medical calendars
prosalud.feature4: Integrated billing module and VIP loyalty program
prosalud.feature5: Diagnostic system based on ICD-10 classification
prosalud.techList: ASP.NET MVC, C#, SQL Server, Dapper, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
prosalud.challenge1: Architecture design for handling sensitive medical data
prosalud.challenge2: Implementation of intuitive interface with Bootstrap
prosalud.challenge3: Complex relational database modeling for health sector
